name: Rhubarb Soup
keywords: appetizer, dessert, crème fraîche, red wine, rhubarb, gluten-free, nut-free, spring, summer
recipeIngredient: One stalk rhubarb, julienned, 2 inches long

recipeInstructions.text: Place the rhubarb, water and sugar in a large pot. Stir and simmer over medium heat for 20 minutes or until the rhubarb is soft.
Add the cinnamon, lemon slices and red wine and simmer for 15 minutes.
Remove from the heat and strain the soup through a sieve. Allow the soup to come to room temperature, cover and refrigerate.
Serve the soup very cold in bowls with a dollop of creme fraiche and julienned rhubarb.
